languages.text: [draft]Enemies that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the Psyker (or Psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} while trying to hit the Psyker) with a ranged attack, suffer <u>2+({g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}irreducible damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [draft]Enemies that hit the Psyker (or Psyker's cover while trying to hit the Psyker) with a ranged attack, suffer <u>2+(psy rating)</u> irreducible damage.
